接口的使用
org.springframework.web.reactive.resource.ResourceResolver

  • 使用ResourceResolver的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.reactive.config
    Spring WebFlux configuration infrastructure.
    org.springframework.web.reactive.resource
    Support classes for serving static resources.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.config中ResourceResolver的使用

      返回变量类型为ResourceResolver的类型的org.springframework.web.reactive.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected List<ResourceResolver> ResourceChainRegistration.getResourceResolvers() 
      参数类型为ResourceResolver的org.springframework.web.reactive.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ResourceChainRegistration ResourceChainRegistration.addResolver(ResourceResolver resolver)
      Add a resource resolver to the chain.

    • org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中ResourceResolver的使用

      实现ResourceResolver的org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractResourceResolver
      Base ResourceResolver providing consistent logging.
      class  CachingResourceResolver
      A ResourceResolver that resolves resources from a Cache or otherwise delegates to the resolver chain and caches the result.
      class  EncodedResourceResolver
      Resolver that delegates to the chain, and if a resource is found, it then attempts to find an encoded (e.g. gzip, brotli) variant that is acceptable based on the "Accept-Encoding" request header.
      class  GzipResourceResolver
      已过时。 
      as of 5.1, in favor of using EncodedResourceResolver
      class  PathResourceResolver
      A simple ResourceResolver that tries to find a resource under the given locations matching to the request path.
      class  VersionResourceResolver
      Resolves request paths containing a version string that can be used as part of an HTTP caching strategy in which a resource is cached with a date in the distant future (e.g. 1 year) and cached until the version, and therefore the URL, is changed.
      class  WebJarsResourceResolver
      A ResourceResolver that delegates to the chain to locate a resource and then attempts to find a matching versioned resource contained in a WebJar JAR file.
      返回变量类型为ResourceResolver的类型的org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      List<ResourceResolver> ResourceWebHandler.getResourceResolvers()
      Return the list of configured resource resolvers.
      类型变量类型为ResourceResolver的org.springframework.web.reactive.resource中的方法参数 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ResourceWebHandler.setResourceResolvers(List<ResourceResolver> resourceResolvers)
      Configure the list of ResourceResolvers to use.
